column4: i want put my movies on a ubuntu folder and open with WDTV. did anyone knows what program use for this?
Check out https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Xbox360Media#UPnP_sharing_with_uShare (A google suggests wdtv works with dlna devices in the same way as the xbox)
actually ignore those instructions!!! ushare should be part of the standard repository..
I'd look into ushare. "sudo apt-get install ushare".
